title: Headphone connected via "Type C to 3.5mm" adapter is not working in my Pixel 2 XL
content: Headphone connected via Type c to 3.5mm adapter is not working.... I had this issue earlier and resolved by help center (Mobile sent to Mumbai and it took nearly 7 days to get back.. provided by an alternate mobile but this option available only in Chennai (for Tamilnadu users)... Now I'm in my Hometown and my mobile is needed most for my work... I couldn't send it via parcel to your help center.... Please Help me to solve this issue.... My warranty expires by this November (purchased on Nov 2018 since Pixel 2 XL additional 1 year extended warranty )....
